agency_desc: A nonprofit organization that is committed to improving the quality of life for seniors by providing paid on the job training and assisting them in their search for jobs within their community.
service_description: Provides community service job training program for seniors.
site_details: Call to schedule an appointment.
site_eligibility: Low income individuals -- Age 55 or older -- Living in Crawford, Dubois, Harrison, Orange, Perry, or Spencer County

agency_desc: "OVGC is an investor-owned utility which provides natural gas distribution and transportation services to residential, commercial, industrial, and governmental customers in 16 Indiana counties and 1 county in Ohio."
site_name: OHIO VALLEY GAS CORPORATION - TELL CITY DISTRICT
service_description: Provides natural gas utility services and handles billing and connections/disconnections for customers in select areas of Dubois, Perry, and Spencer County. Special payment plans, including a budget payment plan to spread the cost of service out more equally throughout the year, may be available for customers.
site_details: Walk in, call, or visit the website for information.
site_eligibility: Open

agency_desc: A church offering worship services and charitable outreach, including a food pantry.
service_description: Provides perishable and nonperishable food to those in need. Personal grooming and toiletry items may also be available. Limited service area.
site_details: Walk in.
site_eligibility: Living in Perry County -- Limit one visit per month

agency_desc: A nonprofit, community-based food pantry.
service_description: Provides nonperishable food to those in need. Perishable food and toiletries may be available, depending on donations.
site_details: Walk in.
site_eligibility: Open -- Limit visit to twice monthly

agency_desc: An elected official responsible for administering the township, including such duties as providing township assistance, burial of the indigent, and maintaining the township budget.
service_description: May be able to assist township residents who are experiencing an unexpected crisis with basic needs, such as:  Essential utilities -- Burial/Cremation expenses -- Housing expense -- Work/Medical transportation -- Food/Clothing -- Necessary medications/medical care assistance is at the discretion of the trustee. Denials can be appealed to the county commissioner; information on appealing is included in the denial letter.
taxonomy_name: Prescription Drugs for Specific Health Conditions
nameLevel4: Prescription Drugs for Specific Health Conditions

site_schedule.name: Prescription Drugs for Specific Health Conditions

site_eligibility: MUST LIVE IN TOWNSHIP (Visit www.censusreporter.org/locate and type in home address to discover township.) -- With financial need based on assessment -- Able to provide documentation of income and expenses for all household members

agency_desc: Represents the state of Indiana in felony and misdemeanor criminal prosecutions, conducts criminal investigations, supervises Grand Jury proceedings, enforces child support orders, conducts juvenile adjudication and prosecution, enforces traffic violations, and provides information and assistance to victims of crime.
service_description: Provides advocacy, information, referrals, and support services to crime victims and witnesses in Perry County. Assists in the filing of restraining or protective orders, offers court accompaniment services, and provides information about case status, victim compensation, victim rights, and the legal process.
site_details: Call for information.
site_eligibility: Victims and witnesses of major crimes in Perry County
Varies

To File for Child Support Assistance -- Living in Perry County -- Parent, guardian, aunt, uncle, or grandparent who has physical custody of a child (ages 0-18) -- Requiring financial support from a noncustodial parent of the child

agency_desc: A locally governed Community Action Agency, that engages in making life better by providing opportunities, which empower people to improve the quality of life and address the causes and effects of poverty in Southern Indiana.
service_description: Offers individual development savings accounts for low-income adults. Participants receive matching funds for money they save toward buying a home, paying for post-secondary education or starting or expanding a small business.
site_details: Call for enrollment information.
site_eligibility: Low income (call for assessment) -- complete financial training
Open
Living in the home (either as an owner or a renter) -- With household income at or below 200% Federal Poverty Guidelines -- Approved for energy assistance program (EAP)
Household income below set limits -- Below 50% of the area income median -- Excluding Tell City

agency_desc: Offers a full-service hospital providing a wide range of diagnostic, treatment, and health care programs, including 24-hour emergency care.
service_description: Offers a full-service hospital providing a wide range of diagnostic, treatment, and health care programs, including 24-hour emergency care.
site_details: Walk in for emergency care. Call for additional information.
site_eligibility: Open
Received, receiving, or planning to receive medically necessary health care services from Perry Memorial Hospital (or guarantor of someone who received such services) -- Low to moderate income

agency_desc: A public library that provides access to fiction and non-fiction library materials to patrons of all ages.
service_description: Maintains a public lending library and provides phone-based reference assistance. In-house services include public computer and Internet access.
site_details: Walk in to apply for a library card, check out materials, or use in-house services. Call for information.
site_eligibility: Most in-house services, including computer stations: Open -- For a resident library card: Living in Perry County

agency_desc: A public library that provides access to fiction and non-fiction library materials to patrons of all ages.
site_name: PERRY COUNTY PUBLIC LIBRARY - CANNELTON BRANCH
service_description: Maintains a public lending library and provides phone-based reference assistance. In-house services include public computer and Internet access.
site_details: Walk in to apply for a library card, check out materials, or use in-house services. Call for information.
site_eligibility: Most in-house services, including computer stations: Open -- For a resident library card: Living in Perry County

agency_desc: A government agency that provides public health nursing, works to control the spread of communicable disease, investigates environmental hazards, and maintains vital records for the county.
service_description: Provides inspections, permits, code enforcement, and other services to protect the health and safety of Perry County residents. Regulates septic systems, public swimming pools, tattoo parlors, and food service establishments in the county. Investigates reports of sanitation violations, substandard housing conditions, and air or water pollution. Offers information and referrals regarding household environmental hazards such as mold, lead, water contamination, mosquitoes, and rodents.
site_details: Call for information, to request services, or to make a report.
site_eligibility: Varies by service
Open
Living in Perry County
Varies by service; serves Perry County
Living in Perry County -- Age 19 or older

Living in Perry County -- Testing is recommended for any child 6 months through 6 years old who: Lives in or visits a building constructed before 1978 -Or- lives with someone who works with lead (such as a battery factory, steel smelter, stained glass) -OR- has a sibling or playmate who has been diagnosed with lead poisoning.
Varies by service; call for details.
Births/deaths occurring in Perry County -- Individual named on the birth certificate, parent, or other adult with a legal right to the certificate
Living in Perry County -- Age 6 months and older

Living in Perry County -- Age 2 months through 18 years -- Without health insurance -OR- insurance does not cover needed vaccine (including coverage that has capped out) -OR- insured through Medicaid -OR- American Indian or Alaskan Native, regardless of insurance status

agency_desc: A nonprofit, community-based food pantry serving Perry County.
service_description: Provides nonperishable food to people in need. Perishable food, toiletries, and hygiene products may also be available, depending on donations.
site_details: Walk in.
site_eligibility: Open; limit one visit per month

agency_desc: The County Clerk maintains records of all civil and criminal court activities, administers jury draw, child support collections, and voter registration, issues marriage licenses and records state tax liens in Perry County.
service_description: Serves as a voter registration site and provides information about voting, candidates, absentee voting, and volunteering to work the polls. Oversees county-level elections, candidate filings, and campaign finance.
taxonomy_name: Criminal Record Expungement Petition Filing Offices
nameLevel4: Criminal Record Expungement Petition Filing Offices
site_details: Call for information -- Walk in or visit website to register

site_schedule.name: Criminal Record Expungement Petition Filing Offices
Marriage Licenses
site_schedule.schedule: Mon-Fri 8am-4pm --  Applications will not be processed after 3:30 p.m.

site_eligibility: Registering to vote: United States citizen -- Age 18 by the day of the next election -- Not currently incarcerated -- To vote: Registered to vote a minimum of 29 days before the election
Parents ordered by the court to pay or receive child support
Varies by service; serves Perry County

Marriage license: Both parties at least age 18 (call or visit website for exceptions) -- At least one applicant from this county -OR- both from out of state -- Certified copies: License must have been issued in this county

agency_desc: A government agency that administers housing assistance programs.
service_description: Serves as an application and re-certification site for the Section 8 Choice Voucher Program in the city of Tell City in Perry County. Housing Choice Vouchers help eligible households pay the rent on privately owned homes of their choosing (property owners must agree to program participation). The wait list for Housing Choice Vouchers in this area is currently OPEN. People already on the wait list must keep their contact information current to remain on the list.
site_details: Call or walk in to pick up an application for the wait list.
site_eligibility: Household income below set limits
Low income -- US citizens and eligible immigrants

agency_desc: A government agency that administers housing assistance programs.
service_description: Offers subsidized, income-based rental apartments to qualified seniors and persons with disabilities at the Twilight Towers apartment complex in Tell City. Applications to be placed on the wait list are currently being accepted.
site_details: Walk in to pick up an application or call to have application mailed.
site_eligibility: Low income -- US citizens and eligible immigrants -- Age 62 or older -OR- age 18 or older receiving SSI disability

agency_desc: Government agency that locates, identifies, and appraises all taxable property in Perry County.
service_description: Calculates the value of all taxable property in Perry County, which is then used to assess taxes.  Hears appeals of assessments, oversees reassessments, and maintains information on boundaries and ownership.
site_details: Call or visit the website for more information. www.perrycounty.in.gov
site_eligibility: Varies by service; limited to taxable property in Perry County

agency_desc: A nonprofit organization that offers a senior center and transportation services for seniors.
service_description: Provides curb-to-curb transportation for people living in Perry County. Rides are provided for medical appointments, grocery shopoing, work transportation, visiting family, and other errands.
site_details: Call 72 hours in advance to schedule a ride (recommended).

site_schedule.name: Senior Centers
site_schedule.schedule: Office: Mon-Fri 8am-12:30pm and 1:30-4pm -- Scheduled activities. Visit website

site_eligibility: Open
Age 60 or older

agency_desc: Administers the elementary, middle, and high schools within the district.
service_description: Administers the elementary, middle, and high schools in this school district. Provides student transportation services and maintains information on school locations, enrollment, fees, and curricula. District provides information regarding special education services for students age 3-22 with disabilities.
site_details: Call for information about school assignments, transportation, or other issues. -- Contact the assigned school to enroll.

agency_desc: Provides law enforcement, crime investigation, crime prevention, emergency assistance, and other police duties for the city of Cannelton in Perry County.
service_description: Provides law enforcement, crime investigation, crime prevention, emergency assistance, and other police duties for the city of Cannelton in Perry County. Persons in need of emergency police assistance should call 9-1-1.
site_details: Call 9-1-1 for emergency assistance. For nonemergency services, call the office during business hours or call Perry County dispatch after hours.
site_eligibility: Open; serves the city of Cannelton in Perry County

agency_desc: Provides law enforcement, crime investigation, crime prevention, emergency assistance, and other police duties for the city of Tell City in Perry County.
service_description: Provides law enforcement, crime investigation, crime prevention, emergency assistance, and other police duties for the city of Tell City in Perry County. Persons in need of emergency police assistance should call 9-1-1.
site_details: Call 9-1-1 for emergency police assistance. For nonemergency services, call the office during business hours or call Perry County Dispatch after hours.
site_eligibility: Open; serves the city of Tell City in Perry County

agency_desc: Provides governance and municipal services for the city of Tell City in Perry County.
service_description: Maintains and provides information about public park facilities and programming in the city of Tell City in Perry County. Programs vary by season, but may include team sports, summer youth clubs, and after-school programs.
nameLevel3: Land Use Planning and Regulation Services
site_details: Walk in to visit the parks; call or visit the website for information.

site_schedule.schedule: Office: Vary; Parks: Daily dawn to dusk, unless otherwise noted

site_schedule.schedule: Office: Tues and Fri 8am-1pm; Summer: Daily 8am-1pm

site_schedule.schedule: Office: Tues and Fri 8am-1pm; Summer: Daily 8am-1pm

site_schedule.schedule: Office: Tues and Fri 8am-1pm; Summer: Daily 8am-1pm

site_schedule.schedule: Office: Tues and Fri 8am-1pm; Summer: Daily 8am-1pm

Open; serves the city of Tell City in Perry County
Varies by service; services limited to properties within Tell City city limits

agency_desc: Provides governance and municipal services for the city of Tell City in Perry County.
service_description: Provides street and sidewalk maintenance, storm-sewer maintenance, snow and ice control, dead animal pickup, street-sign maintenance, mosquito control, trash pickup, and groundskeeping of public properties in the city of Tell City in Perry County.
site_details: Call for information or to submit a request or make a report.
site_eligibility: Open; serves the city of Tell City in Perry County

agency_desc: Provides governance and municipal services for the city of Tell City in Perry County.
service_description: Provides electricity to Tell City in Perry County through a locally owned and operated utility company partnering with the Indiana Municipal Power Agency (IMPA).
site_details: Call for assistance. Bills may be paid online, in person, by mail, or by phone; a drop box is located at this address.
site_eligibility: Open; serves the city of Tell City in Perry County

agency_desc: Provides maintenance services on public roads and streets.
service_description: Maintains county roadways in Perry County, including patching, paving, snow removal, roadside mowing, and drainage along roadways.
site_details: Call for information or to report a problem. To report urgent problems after hours, call 9-1-1 or Perry County dispatch.
site_eligibility: Open (limited to county roads and county properties in Perry County)

agency_name: HABITAT FOR HUMANITY OF PERRY COUNTY
agency_desc: A nonprofit Christian housing ministry that builds and renovates affordable housing for qualified individuals and families in Perry County.
site_name: HABITAT FOR HUMANITY OF PERRY COUNTY
service_description: Builds and sells homes for eligible low-income persons in Perry County. Participants contribute a set number of hours of labor ("sweat equity") toward the construction of a dwelling that they may then purchase through a zero-interest, low monthly payment loan. Volunteer opportunities are also available for interested individuals and service groups.
site_details: Call to request application.
site_eligibility: Living in Perry County -- Able to pay a mortgage payment -- Total household income from all sources is between 30-60% of area median income (varies by family size; call for information)

agency_desc: Provides food and clothing assistance to residents of Perry County.
service_description: Provides perishable and nonperishable food to those in need. Toiletries and household items may be available, depending on donations. Limited service area.
site_details: Walk in.
site_eligibility: Open -- Not used this pantry during the previous 30 days
Open

agency_desc: A nonprofit organization that provides assistance to those in need.
service_description: Provides maternity and baby clothing (up to 2T) to pregnant women and mothers in need. Diapers and formula are available on a case-by-case basis. Baby furniture, car seats, and strollers may be available based on donations.
site_details: Call to schedule an appointment.
site_eligibility: Living in Perry County
Living in Perry County -- Each program limits assistance to once every 6 months (12 months for the Gas Help Fund); however, clients may apply for one or more of the other programs during that time.

agency_desc: A commercial agency provides electric service for customers within service area.

site_schedule.schedule: Office: Mon-Fri 7am-4pm -- Outage Reporting: Daily 24 hours

agency_desc: County veterans service officers are veterans employed by the county to act as liaisons with county residents for veteran issues, including but not limited to; providing forms, information, and assistance in obtaining state and federal veterans benefits.
service_description: Provides information about and assistance with veterans' benefits to veterans, their surviving spouses, and their children. County service officers can assist in the completion and submission of forms necessary to receive all appropriate federal and state veterans' benefits.
site_details: Call to schedule an appointment.

site_schedule.name: Veteran Benefits Assistance
site_schedule.schedule: Mon, Tues, and Thurs 8am-4pm; Wed and Fri by appointment only

site_eligibility: Veteran, surviving spouses or children of a veteran.
Veterans living in Perry County -- With an appointment at a veterans' hospital or clinic in Owensboro, Kentucky or Evansville, Indiana.

service_description: Provides law enforcement, crime prevention, and criminal investigation services and administers county correctional facilities in Perry County. For emergency assistance, persons should call 9-1-1.
